dt-option.name: searchPanes.emptyMessage

type.description: By setting the `-init searchPanes.emptyMessage` option to a string, any empty cells found in the table will be represented in the pane by that string.

dt-option.default: The default value for the `-init searchPanes.emptyMessage` parameter is `\<i\>No Data\</i\>`.
dt-option.description:
Empty cells will be represented in the panes by the option `-init searchPanes.emptyMessage`. This is useful as it's a more user-friendly way than just having a blank cell. The value is passed through the `-api i18n()` function.
This value is used if both `-init language.searchPanes.emptyMessage` is undefined and `-init columns.searchPanes.emptyMessage` are both undefined for the column corresponding to this SearchPane.
